title: What can determine from electric field vector

content.description: From the electric field vector at a point, one can determine which of the following?
content.question: The direction of the electrostatic force on a test charge of known sign at that pointThe magnitude of the electrostatic force exerted per unit charge on a test charge at that pointThe electrostatic charge at that point

unit.text: 8: Electric Charges, Fields, and Gauss's Law

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
